identity.mission: Create a robust, high-visibility marketplace for heavy services that feels like a premium tool, not a generic SaaS.

headings.usage: Use for all major headings. Tight tracking (-0.02em). uppercase for section titles.

body.usage: Use for all UI text, data, and descriptions. highly legible for numbers.

tamil.usage: Use exclusively for Tamil language content. Ensure 1.5x line height.

spacing_layout.bento_grid: Use grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4. Span 2 cols for key services.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-sm font-bold uppercase tracking-wide
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/10 rounded-sm font-bold

cards.style: bg-card border border-border shadow-sm hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-200 rounded-lg overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-background border-2 border-input focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 rounded-sm h-12

navbar.style: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full border-b bg-background/95 backdrop-blur supports-[backdrop-filter]:bg-background/60

visual_enhancers.texture: Use subtle noise overlay on backgrounds to give a 'concrete' feel.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid full screen gradients. Use mesh gradients only in hero sections: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/20 via-background to-background'.

rules: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Avoid generic centered layouts; use asymmetry.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid.
Use 'Mukta Malar' font for any Tamil text.
Use Google Maps API for location picking.
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio. Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons.
universal_guidelines.mobile_first: Design for 360px width first. Images max-h-[60vh] on mobile.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Set up the theme provider with the specified colors. 2. Install 'Mukta Malar' and 'Chivo' fonts from Google Fonts. 3. Build the 'Bento Grid' layout for the service category page. 4. Implement the dual registration flow (User vs Provider) with high-contrast distinct styles (e.g., User=Orange, Provider=Slate). 5. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page hero and testimonials.
